Name: Legend Of Nazera: War
About the game: Travel through Nazera, a land of balance that has been thrown into war. In your travels, you will find out why the war started and how to stop it. As you progress through the game you will recruit different characters with different abilities. Choose who you feel is best for the battle and take down the enemy ahead of you. But gaining these heroes requires you to pass through trials. Each hero has missions for the player to complete to unlock them. This game is a student project pushing it to become a full-release title that stands on its own. When you join this game you are helping us build more onto this game and complete the story. When you purchase this copy it will give you access to the first arc in the story. If we make enough, and/or find more time to work on it, we can release more after the game is released.
Developers: Coalition of Gamers Geeks and Nerds,Zygobot
Publishers: Coalition of Gamers Geeks and Nerds
